sn24.18:4.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.18:4.3: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:5.1: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.18:5.2: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti … pe ….
sn24.18:6.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.18:6.3: vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.18:6.4: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:6.6: “Yampidaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.18:6.8: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.18:6.10: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.18:6.11: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:7.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhasamudayepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhanirodhepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti—
sn24.18:7.2: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.18:9.2: so attā no ca me siyā;
sn24.18:10.3: Anantavā ca taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti,
sn24.18:11.3: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti.
